reviewText:
Playboy - Biker Babes Hot Wheels & High Heels is fifty-seven minutes long and was released on video in 1997. Biker Babes is hosted by Tylyn John: Playboy Playmate of the Month for March 1992. The vast majority of the video are a bunch of models in the nude. There were only three Playmates in the video: Tylyn John, Nikki Schieler, and Karin Taylor. Her are the segments and my comments on them is the order that they appeared.

Nikki Schieler (Playboy Playmate of the Month for September 1997)\Pool Hall-Getting nude on a motorcycle
Bethany Lorranie & Katalina Verdin\Navy Seals-Getting nude on a boat
Denise\Clean Cycle-Denise gets nude and bathes on a motorcycle. This segment was not done in one take. Denise's panties start off pink, then they are blue and back to pink again. The same goes for the sponge she is bathing. The sponge goes through sever color changes. Also during filming, Denise looks dry when she is suppose to be wet in the segment.
Karin Taylor (Playboy Playmate of the Month for June 1996)\Space Age-Nude on a motorcycle
Daytona-Full nudity towards the end of the segment by one female
Corey Lane, Erin, & Kim\Tattoo Mistress-Five not so sexy females getting it on
Mimie & Shelby\Scooter Ride-Both ladies are full nude in and out of the pool.
Brittany, Carrie, Dawnette, Malaea, & Michelle\Factory Fun-A third into the segment and are five ladies are nude most of the time.
Linda O'Neil\The Presentation-Linda strips to full nudity on and off the motorcycle.
Laura Selway, Shyra De Land, & Vicki\Cross Dressers-Start out nude and then sexually put on their motor cross gear on. Two of the three ladies get wet and a play in a sand box. All three take turns being nude on a rock.
Tylyn John & Avalon Anders\Biker Bash-Tylyn is filming Avalon getting nude on a motorcycle and then Avalon is filming Tylyn getting nude on a motorcycle.

With the exception of two segments and the lack of Playmates, this is really good watch. Playboy - Biker Babes Hot Wheels & High Heels gets an AAA+++.

I picked this video up because Playmates Nikki Schieler was on the cover and Tylyn John was credited as hostess, expecting to possibly see new  footage. There was no new footage of Nikki, just a reused scene of her  playing strip pool for a bike (but is a scene worth watching, read my  review of the Karen McDougal video for all of Nikki's incredible footage).  Tylyn, a tomboyish motorcycle aficionado who unlike many tomboys happens to  be a very pretty girl, narrates the entire video. Very pleasing to look at  as she introduces various segments, but she herself doesn't take her  clothes off until the very last scene in the vid. After watching 90% of the  vid of some rather boring footage (I'll get to the other 10% soon) being  treated to a naked Tylyn John managed to end the video on an up  note.
Most of the video though features non-Playmates. It may be my  opinion, but seeing the Playmates is my only reason to watch Playboy  videos. Not to say that some of the titular "Biker Babes" weren't  attractive, they were just a tad on the "rough" side. I much  prefer the more feminine Playmate vignettes.
Which is why I was so  thrilled by Karin Taylor's uncredited appearance in this video! The Karin  scene is a 5 star rating and if you are a fan of hers you will probably  want to purchase this video. I would bet more copies of this would be sold  if Karin's fans knew she was in it! Her scene starts with her describing  her bike riding fantasy. The usually sweet Karin speaks almost defiantly,  probably in an effort to stick to a rebel biker image. Her last words of  her speech are almost taunting "Riding naked....That's my  fantasy"
And bam, in the next second, YOU are instantly transported  to this fantasy! Karin is back to her sweet happy demeanor, completely  naked except for her donning a pair of leather riding gloves. Then for well  over two solid minutes, it is nothing but Karin riding and cavorting back  and forth on top of a motorcycle. She just flashes her wonderful, pretty  smile and the camera never leaves her incredible nude body for a second.  She rocks back and forth, writhes around, lets go of the handle bars and  stands up on her bike revealing every luscious inch of her perfect body!  Karin is probably one of the most gorgeous Playmates ever and being treated  to a solid, uninterrupted two minute scene of her naked is probably the  ultimate showcase of a Playmate. This is now my favorite Playmate scene. If  you are a fan of Karin, it may prove to be yours too.
